mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_pm ( senderID, receiverID, content, lastUpTime ) VALUES ( #{sender.id}, #{receiver.id}, #{content}, #{lastUpTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.id as id, CAST(p.content AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) AS content, c1.id as senderID, c1.nickname as senderNickname, c1.sex as senderSex, c2.id as receiverID, c2.nickname as receiverNickname, c2.sex as receiverSex FROM t_pm p JOIN t_customer c1 ON p.senderID = c1.id JOIN t_customer c2 ON p.receiverID = c2.id WHERE p.senderID = #{customerID} OR p.receiverID = #{customerID} ORDER BY lastUpTime DESC LIMIT #{startIndex},#{pageSize}

SELECT p.id as id, CAST(p.content AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) AS content, c1.id as senderID, c1.nickname as senderNickname, c1.sex as senderSex, c2.id as receiverID, c2.nickname as receiverNickname, c2.sex as receiverSex, pr.id as prId, pr.pmID as prPmId, CAST(pr.content AS CHAR CHARACTER SET utf8) AS prContent, c3.id as parentReplierID, c3.nickname as parentReplierNickname, c3.sex as parentReplierSex, c4.id as replierID, c4.nickname as replierNickname, c4.sex as replierSex FROM t_pm p JOIN t_customer c1 ON p.senderID = c1.id JOIN t_customer c2 ON p.receiverID = c2.id LEFT JOIN (t_pmreplies pr JOIN t_customer c3 ON pr.parentReplierID = c3.id JOIN t_customer c4 ON pr.replierID = c4.id ) ON p.id = pr.pmID WHERE p.id = #{id}
